collector:Contemplate.NAME: Contemplate
collector:Contemplate.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card from the Collection.
collector:Contemplate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards from your Collection to draw.

collector:SoulSnare.NAME: Soul Snare
collector:SoulSnare.DESCRIPTION: Apply 10 collector:Soulbind. NL Gain !M! collector:Reserve. NL Exhaust.

collector:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
collector:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

collector:SpiritLeech.NAME: Spirit Leech
collector:SpiritLeech.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is collector:Afflicted, apply !M! collector:Soulbind.

collector:ScorchingRay.NAME: Scorching Ray
collector:ScorchingRay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL At the start of your next turn, gain 1 collector:Reserve.

collector:Ember.NAME: Ember
collector:Ember.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL If this card is Exhausted, gain !M! collector:Reserve.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: These embers must be lit, not played.

collector:SparkStrike.NAME: Spark Strike
collector:SparkStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 *Ember into your hand.

collector:Agonize.NAME: Agonize
collector:Agonize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is not collector:Afflicted, apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable.

collector:GreenGaze.NAME: Green Gaze
collector:GreenGaze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you played a Collected card this turn, gain !B! Block.

collector:ShadowWrappings.NAME: Shadow Wrappings
collector:ShadowWrappings.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply collector:Soulbind equal to damage dealt.

collector:Feint.NAME: Feint
collector:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

collector:FairTrade.NAME: Fair Trade
collector:FairTrade.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Draw !M! cards from the Collection.

collector:Summoning.NAME: Summoning
collector:Summoning.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! card from the Collection.
collector:Summoning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! cards from the Collection.

collector:Forgery.NAME: Forgery
collector:Forgery.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards from your Collection. Add it and !M! copy into your hand.
collector:Forgery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards from your Collection. Add it and !M! copies into your hand.

collector:DarkwoodKindling.NAME: Darkwood Kindling
collector:DarkwoodKindling.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is Exhausted, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must light this kindling to use it.

collector:Hoard.NAME: Hoard
collector:Hoard.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL This turn, they Retain and are Unplayable.
